movies.name: Akira
movies.description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.
movies.starring: Mitsuo Iwata, Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama

movies.name: Spirited Away
movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
movies.starring: Miyu Irino

movies.name: Grave of the Fireflies
movies.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.
movies.starring: Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi, Yoshiko Shinohara

movies.name: Ghost in the Shell
movies.description: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.
movies.starring: Atsuko Tanaka, Iemasa Kayumi, Akio Otsuka

movies.name: Paprika
movies.description: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.
movies.starring: Megumi Hayashibara, Toru Emori, Katsunosuke Hori

movies.name: The Wind Rises
movies.description: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.
movies.starring: Hideaki Anno, Hidetoshi Nishijima, Miori Takimoto

movies.name: Perfect Blue
movies.description: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.
movies.starring: Junko Iwao, Rica Matsumoto, Shinpachi Tsuji

movies.name: Patlabor 2
movies.description: When a terrorist attack is blamed on the Air Force, Special Vehicle Unit 2 gets caught in the middle of a growing political conflict.
movies.starring: Mina Tominago, Briony Glassco

movies.name: My Neighbor Totoro
movies.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.
movies.starring: Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto

movies.name: Neo-Tokyo
movies.description: A trilogy of separate stories. In Labyrinth labyrinthos, a girl and her cat enter a strange world. In Running Man, a racer takes on the ultimate opponent. In Construction Cancellation Order, a man must shut down worker robots.
movies.starring: Hideko Yoshida, Masane Tsukayama, Yu Mizushima

movies.name: Royal Space Force: The Wings of HonnÃªamise
movies.description: In an alternative Earth, a young astronaut participates in a controversial fledgling space program.
movies.starring: Leo Morimoto, Mitsuki Yayoi

movies.name: Princess Mononoke
movies.description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.
movies.starring: Yoji Matsuda, Yuriko Ishida, Yuko Tanaka

movies.name: Pom Poko
movies.description: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.
movies.starring: Shincho Kokontei, Makoto Nonomura, Yuriko Ishida

movies.name: Barefoot Gen
movies.description: A powerful statement against war, Barefoot Gen is a disturbing story about the effect of the atomic bomb on a boy's life and the lives of the Japanese people.
movies.starring: Issei Miyazaki, Yoshie Shimamura

movies.name: Metropolis
movies.description: Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.
movies.starring: Toshio Furukawa, Yuka Imoto

movies.name: Super Dimension Fortress Macross:Do You Remember Love?
movies.description: Earth braces for an invasion of giant male bionoids and their enemy, giant female bionoids.
movies.starring: Arihiro Hase, Mari Iijima

movies.name: Millennium Actress
movies.description: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.
movies.starring: Miyoko Shoji, Shozo Izuka, Mami Koyama

movies.name: Belladonna of Sadness
movies.description: After being raped by an evil feudal lord and subsequently getting banished from her village, a peasant girl makes a pact with the Devil to gain magical powers and take her revenge.
movies.starring: Aiko Nagayama, Chinatsu Nakayama

movies.name: Redline
movies.description: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.
movies.starring: Takuya Kimura, Yu Aoi, Tadanobu Asano

movies.name: Mind Game
movies.description: After a deadly encounter with two yakuza, a loser with a crush on his childhood girlfriend goes to heaven and back, embarking on a psychedelic self-discovery experience with her and his friends.
movies.starring: Toshio Furukawa, Yuka Imoto
